overview: Vikram Kashyap, Vik founded Canopy Financial, Inc., in 2004 and serves as its Chairman and Chief Executive Officer. Mr. Kashyap has focused his career on building technology-driven online businesses. Prior to Canopy Financial, Mr. Kashyap served as a Management Consultant of American Express and Ameriprise, where he worked on a series of strategic initiatives including corporate spin-outs, product strategy, and service pricing. Prior to American Express, Mr. Kashyap served as Vice President of Business Development of eMeta Corporation. Prior to eMeta, Mr. Kashyap served with Battery Ventures, where he executed and supported investments for a $1 billion technology venture capital fund. He also co-founded RedShores. Mr. Kashyap is a graduate of Harvard University.
